contents-list.explanation: the act or process of trying to get or win something, such as a prize or a higher level of success, that someone else is also trying to get or win.
samples: There will be fierce competition for the top sports.

contents-list.explanation: a person who teaches and trains an athlete or performer.
samples: Suzy was drama coach when she was young.

contents-list.explanation: an area of land that is controlled by its own government.
samples: The two countries have a lot in common.

contents-list.explanation: a person who likes and admires someone, such as a famous person, or something, such as a sport or a sports team in a very enthusiastic way.
samples: I am a huge baseball fan.

contents-list.explanation: a person who plays a sport or game.
samples: She's one of the team's best players.

contents-list.explanation: a group of people who compete in a sport, game, etc., against another group.
samples: He is the best player on his team.
